items.title: Awesome Terraform
items.content_text:
### Tools / Community providers

*   [tf-init-booster (⭐7)](https://github.com/hayorov/terraform-init-booster) - A Pre-terraform routine that speedups terraform modules download for bulky blueprints.
*   [tf-summarize (⭐609)](https://github.com/dineshba/tf-summarize) - A command-line utility to print the summary of the terraform plan
items.content_html:
Tools / Community providers

  • tf-init-booster (⭐7) - A Pre-terraform routine that speedups terraform modules download for bulky blueprints.
  • tf-summarize (⭐609) - A command-line utility to print the summary of the terraform plan

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Polls and Events

*   [Christmas Community (⭐359)](https://github.com/Wingysam/Christmas-Community) - Create a simple place for your entire family to use to find gifts that people want, and to avoid double-gifting. `AGPL-3.0` `Docker/Nodejs`
*   [Framadate](https://framadate.org/abc/) - Online service for planning an appointment or make a decision quickly and easily: Make a poll, Define dates or subjects to choose, Send the poll link to your friends or colleagues, Discuss and make a decision. ([Demo](https://framadate.org/aqg259dth55iuhwm), [Source Code](https://framagit.org/framasoft/framadate?)) `CECILL-B` `PHP`
items.content_html:
Software / Polls and Events

  • Christmas Community (⭐359) - Create a simple place for your entire family to use to find gifts that people want, and to avoid double-gifting. AGPL-3.0 Docker/Nodejs
  • Framadate - Online service for planning an appointment or make a decision quickly and easily: Make a poll, Define dates or subjects to choose, Send the poll link to your friends or colleagues, Discuss and make a decision. (Demo, Source Code) CECILL-B PHP

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Framework-agnostic Plugins / Integrations

*   [vite-plugin-virtual-mpa (⭐142)](https://github.com/emosheeep/vite-plugin-virtual-mpa) - Out-of-box MPA plugin, with html template engine and virtual files support, which generate multiple files using only one template.
items.content_html:
Framework-agnostic Plugins / Integrations

  • vite-plugin-virtual-mpa (⭐142) - Out-of-box MPA plugin, with html template engine and virtual files support, which generate multiple files using only one template.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [which-jspm (⭐0)](https://github.com/zkuzmic/which-jspm/) - Adds `npm`, `yarn` or `pnpm` to the end of your prompt depending on what lockfile(s) it detects in the current directory.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • which-jspm (⭐0) - Adds npm, yarn or pnpm to the end of your prompt depending on what lockfile(s) it detects in the current directory.

items.title: Awesome for Beginners
items.content_text:
### .NET * [Legerity (⭐83)](https://github.com/MADE-Apps/legerity) *(label: good first issue)*
A framework for speeding up the development of automated UI tests for Windows, Android, iOS, and Web with Appium/Selenium on .NET. * [Legerity for Uno Platform (⭐19)](https://github.com/MADE-Apps/legerity-uno) *(label: good first issue)*
An extension framework to Legerity for speeding up the development of automated UI tests for Uno Platform applications with Appium/Selenium on .NET.
items.content_html:
.NET

  • Legerity (⭐83) (label: good first issue)
    A framework for speeding up the development of automated UI tests for Windows, Android, iOS, and Web with Appium/Selenium on .NET.
  • Legerity for Uno Platform (⭐19) (label: good first issue)
    An extension framework to Legerity for speeding up the development of automated UI tests for Uno Platform applications with Appium/Selenium on .NET.

items.title: Awesome Elixir
items.content_text:
### Algorithms and Data structures

*   [clope (⭐22)](https://github.com/ayrat555/clope) - Elixir implementation of CLOPE: A Fast and Effective Clustering Algorithm for Transactional Data.
*   [Closure Table (⭐35)](https://github.com/florinpatrascu/closure_table) - Closure Table for Elixir - a simple solution for storing and manipulating complex hierarchies. It provides in-memory and Ecto adapters.

### Applications

*   [Caddishouse (⭐15)](https://github.com/caddishouse/reader) - A web-based document reader that connects to your cloud storage accounts using Phoenix/LiveView.

### Configuration

*   [weave](https://gitlab.com/gt8/open-source/elixir/weave) - JIT configuration loader that works with Kubernetes and Docker Swarm.

### Geolocation

*   [srtm (⭐7)](https://github.com/adriankumpf/srtm) - Query locations for elevation data from the NASA Shuttle Radar Topography Mission.

### Images

*   [thumbor\_client (⭐4)](https://github.com/globocom/thumbor-client-ex) - Client for Thumbor.

### Instrumenting / Monitoring

*   [app\_optex (⭐5)](https://github.com/sashman/app_optex) - Client for AppOptics API. Send metrics and tags to AppOptics time series service.

### Miscellaneous

*   [cubdb (⭐610)](https://github.com/lucaong/cubdb) - CubDB is an embedded key-value database, written in the Elixir language. It runs locally, it is schema-less, and backed by a single file.
*   [quarantine (⭐4)](https://github.com/leorog/quarantine) - Quarantine is a tiny OTP application for feature toggles.

### ORM and Datamapping

*   [ecto\_list (⭐19)](https://github.com/popo63301/ecto_list) - Simple ordered model management with Ecto.

### Testing

*   [propcheck (⭐384)](https://github.com/alfert/propcheck) - Property based testing for Elixir.

### Utilities

*   [sitemapper (⭐46)](https://github.com/tomtaylor/sitemapper) - A fast, stream based XML Sitemap generator.

### Books

*   [Elixir Succinctly](https://www.syncfusion.com/ebooks/elixir-succinctly) - A short book to learn the basic of Elixir and its ecosystem.
items.content_html:
Algorithms and Data structures

  • clope (⭐22) - Elixir implementation of CLOPE: A Fast and Effective Clustering Algorithm for Transactional Data.
  • Closure Table (⭐35) - Closure Table for Elixir - a simple solution for storing and manipulating complex hierarchies. It provides in-memory and Ecto adapters.

Applications

  • Caddishouse (⭐15) - A web-based document reader that connects to your cloud storage accounts using Phoenix/LiveView.

Configuration

  • weave - JIT configuration loader that works with Kubernetes and Docker Swarm.

Geolocation

  • srtm (⭐7) - Query locations for elevation data from the NASA Shuttle Radar Topography Mission.

Images

  • thumbor_client (⭐4) - Client for Thumbor.

Instrumenting / Monitoring

  • app_optex (⭐5) - Client for AppOptics API. Send metrics and tags to AppOptics time series service.

Miscellaneous

  • cubdb (⭐610) - CubDB is an embedded key-value database, written in the Elixir language. It runs locally, it is schema-less, and backed by a single file.
  • quarantine (⭐4) - Quarantine is a tiny OTP application for feature toggles.

ORM and Datamapping

  • ecto_list (⭐19) - Simple ordered model management with Ecto.

Testing

  • propcheck (⭐384) - Property based testing for Elixir.

Utilities

  • sitemapper (⭐46) - A fast, stream based XML Sitemap generator.

Books

  • Elixir Succinctly - A short book to learn the basic of Elixir and its ecosystem.

items.title: Awesome Privacy
items.content_text:
### Bookmarking

*   Pocket (Formerly Read It Later) - [Bad privacy policy](https://tosdr.org/en/service/384). [Apps have trackers](https://reports.exodus-privacy.eu.org/en/reports/com.ideashower.readitlater.pro/latest/) and requires many permissions.
*   Evernote Web Clipper -  [Bad privacy policy](https://tosdr.org/en/service/207). [Apps have many trackers](https://reports.exodus-privacy.eu.org/en/reports/com.evernote/latest/) and require too many permissions.
*   [LinkAce (⭐3k)](https://github.com/Kovah/LinkAce)
*   [LinkDing (⭐8.6k)](https://github.com/sissbruecker/linkding)
items.content_html:
Bookmarking

  • Pocket (Formerly Read It Later) - Bad privacy policy. Apps have trackers and requires many permissions.
  • Evernote Web Clipper - Bad privacy policy. Apps have many trackers and require too many permissions.
  • LinkAce (⭐3k)
  • LinkDing (⭐8.6k)
